page.title: 19HOUSING 1
page.content: Presently, the main tourist season runs from Easter to the end of October, but there are plans to make Pitlochry an all-year resort. The chief development is the plan for a new Recreation Centre which would include a swimming pool, sports hall, artificial ski facilities etc. The nearby Dundarach Hotel is to be converted into a health farm, and there are also plans to include facilities for conference and exhibition purposes in the complex. The finance for this venture is available from various councils, trusts etc and according to Mr Penker, Chairman of the local Tourist Association, is well on the way to fruition. Further employment would of course result from the developments.
